info.creatorsPhotoAlt: Jakub and Bartosz - creators of Pollar

info.ctaDescription: Join thousands of readers who started their day with Pollar. No ads, no clickbait.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Information should serve understanding, not profit. We focus on truth, not stirring emotions.

quality.title: Quality over quantity
quality.description: Signal amplification, noise elimination. We group related stories and present different perspectives.

respect.title: Respect for the reader
respect.description: Every moment should leave you more informed, not more anxious. We build tools for thinking people.

team.jakubDesc: Builds the entire technical side of Pollar — from interface to servers. Ensures speed, efficiency and reliability.
team.bartoszDesc: Ensures intuitiveness and makes sure Pollar doesn't take too much of your time while delivering value.

truth.title: Information should serve understanding, not profit.
truth.content: We focus on reliable information, not on stirring emotions. We avoid sensationalism and excessive stimuli, prioritizing context, clarity, and usefulness for the reader.

quality.title: We believe in quality over quantity.
quality.content: Instead of fighting for clicks, we fight for clarity. Instead of amplifying noise, we distill the signal. We group related stories, eliminate duplicates, and present different perspectives without editorial bias.

respect.title: Every story deserves context. Every reader deserves respect.
respect.content: Every moment spent here should leave you more informed, not more anxious. We build tools for thinking people who want to understand their world.

contact.title: Who we are
contact.intro: Pollar is created by Jakub Dudek and Bartosz Kasprzycki.
contact.jakub: Jakub, a developer from Krakow, builds the entire technical side — from the interface to the servers — ensuring everything works fast, efficiently, and reliably.
contact.bartosz: Bartosz is responsible for product and marketing — making sure every interaction with Pollar is intuitive and doesn't take more time than necessary.
contact.goal: The goal is shared: to help people stay informed without overwhelming them with too much information. The project is in beta — if you have an idea or notice a bug, write to us.
contact.feedbackText: We'd love to hear your suggestions, ideas, or bug reports. Write directly to our email.

pro.title: Pollar Pro

newInterface.title: New Interface
newInterface.description: Redesigned from scratch. Faster, more responsive, and error-resistant. Optimized content loading.

favoriteCategories.title: Favorite Categories
favoriteCategories.description: Choose topics that interest you. The algorithm will adapt content to your preferences.

aiFeuilletons.description: Original analyses generated by Gemini. Polish politics, geopolitics, and economics - updated twice daily.

sources.title: News Sources
sources.subtitle: All news sources tracked by Pollar
sources.dataProviderDescription: Event Registry is a news analytics platform that monitors over 150,000 sources in 60+ languages. Articles are collected in real time and enriched by AI with entity recognition, categorization, and sentiment analysis. Pollar uses their API as a raw data provider — all further analysis, event clustering, and political classification is done independently by us.
